event.title: 3/13 Tokyo International Friends Party @ JP TOKYO Roppongi * 3.5h All-You-Can-Drink * Girls:FREE * 1000å††OFF
event.description:
YES, our parties ARE happening !!!
THANKS for the many brave ANTI-Corona’ers joining last week…you created an awesome vibe again.
AS long as people are going to work in crowded trains, our parties will go on…
IF anybody tells you working is OK, but having FUN is not…don’t trust them ğŸ˜‰
F*** Corona, Meet FRIENDS, Celebrate LIFE…the party continues…
-—
ä¸‹è¨˜ã®æ—¥æœ¬èªã‚’ã”è¦§ä¸‹ã•ã„ Join us on Friday, March 13 at the popular JP TOKYO in Roppongi to meet lots of internationally minded Japanese friends as well as many foreigners currently staying in the craziest city on this planet.
Enjoy 3.5h All-You-Can-Drink and make lots of cool new buddies at the same time, but you probably won’t remember any of them next day ;-)

1000 Yen OFF with reservation and all details at:
3/13 Intl. Friends Party @ JP TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_friends_party -
3/14 NEW Intl. Party @ VIZEL Shibuya http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_party_shibuya -
3/19 Intl. Friends Party @ RAKAN TOKYO Roppongi http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_intl_party -
3/20 Intl. Friends Party Shinjuku @ ORIZURU http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shinjuku_friends_party -
3/21 NEW Intl. Party Shibuya @ KITSUNE http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=internationalfriendsparty -
3/27 …TBA…
3/28 NEW Intl. Party Shibuya @ LAUREL TOKYO http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shibuya_friends_party -
Guys: 1000 Yen
Girls: FREE !!
Birthday Present: FREE Admission, if your birthday is in March.

- Every week, tons of people join Tokyo’s #1 International Party !!
- Make lots of new friends currently staying in this crazy city
- 3.5 hours All-You-Can-Drink Cocktails, Beer, Softdrinks etc.
- ’Cause the best night you will never remember ;-)
- Make new Japanese friends and improve your Japanese skills.
- Find romance or have great talks in a cool international space.
- The party is what you make it!!!

3/13 (Fri) Tokyo Intl. Friends Party @ JP TOKYO Roppongi
20:00~23:30 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/qpjTovrCX2s
Address: Yoko Central Bldg. 6F,[masked] Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_friends_party

3/14 (Sat) NEW International Friends Party Tokyo @ VIZEL Shibuya
20:00~24:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/F5HLE7GLTgccVyrC7
Address: 12-3 Udagawacho, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_party_shibuya

3/19 (Thu) Tokyo Intl. Friends Party @ RAKAN TOKYO Roppongi
20:00~23:30 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/r3cmxwRbp6u
Address: Coco Roppongi Bldg. 4F,[masked] Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=tokyo_intl_party

3/20 (Fri) NEW International Friends Party Tokyo @ ORIZURU Shinjuku
20:00~23:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/m3ULujQeuU9hQwuH6
Address: Umemura Bldg. 5F, 1-3 Kabukicho, Shinjuku-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shinjuku_friends_party

3/21 (Sat) NEW International Friends Party Tokyo @ KITSUNE Shibuya
20:15~23:15 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/6oHFPbtDt8C2
Address: Chatelet Shibuya B1F,[masked] Higashi, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=internationalfriendsparty

3/28 (Sat) NEW Tokyo International Friends Party @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya
20:00~23:00 — Map: https://goo.gl/maps/DnEzoTkwUAz
Address: SK PLAZA Bldg. B1F,[masked] Dogenzaka, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
Details at http://www.tokyoparty.org/party.php?lang=en&p=shibuya_friends_party

Alone or with friends, everybody is welcome to join the fun.
LIFE is a PARTY… start living it!
